quote: It is not that we have a short time to live, but that we waste much of it.
author: Seneca

quote: You could leave life right now. Let that determine what you do and say and think.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: The trouble is, you think you have time.
author: Jack Kornfield

quote: Do not act as if you had ten thousand years to live. The inescapable is hanging over your head. While you have life in you, while you still can, make yourself good.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Every man has two lives, and the second starts when he realizes he has just one.
author: Confucius

quote: Do not squander time, for that’s the stuff life is made of.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Enjoy yourself. It’s later than you think.
author: Chinese proverb

quote: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
author: Chinese proverb

quote: How did it get so late so soon?
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: It is not length of life, but depth of life.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Begin at once to live, and count each separate day as a separate life.
author: Seneca

quote: You are not guaranteed a tomorrow. Live today.
author: Anonymous

quote: Life is short, and it is up to you to make it sweet.
author: Sarah Louise Delany

quote: Our lives are but specks of dust falling through the fingers of time. Like dust, we settle in this place and leave nothing but memories.
author: Anonymous

quote: What we do in life echoes in eternity.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Lost time is never found again.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: How we spend our days is, of course, how we spend our lives.
author: Annie Dillard

quote: They always say time changes things, but you actually have to change them yourself.
author: Andy Warhol

quote: Go for it now. The future is promised to no one.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: The afternoon knows what the morning never suspected.
author: Robert Frost

quote: Don’t count the days, make the days count.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Life isn’t a matter of milestones, but of moments.
author: Rose Kennedy

quote: You will never find time for anything. If you want time, you must make it.
author: Charles Buxton

quote: Death is nature’s way of telling you to slow down.
author: Dick Sharples

quote: Time is the most valuable thing a man can spend.
author: Theophrastus

quote: Carpe diem. Seize the day, boys. Make your lives extraordinary.
author: Dead Poets Society

quote: One day you will wake up and there won’t be any more time to do the things you’ve always wanted. Do it now.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
author: Mae West

quote: Don’t live the same year 75 times and call it a life.
author: Robin Sharma

quote: Enjoy the little things, for one day you may look back and realize they were the big things.
author: Robert Brault

quote: Life moves pretty fast. If you don’t stop and look around once in a while, you could miss it.
author: Ferris Bueller’s Day Off

quote: We have two lives, and the second begins when we realize we only have one.
author: Confucius

quote: Time flies over us, but leaves its shadow behind.
author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quote: It is not the length of life, but the depth.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Life and death are one thread, the same line viewed from different sides.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Death is not the opposite of life, but a part of it.
author: Haruki Murakami

quote: We all have two lives. The second begins the moment we realize we have only one.
author: Tom Hiddleston

quote: Do every act of your life as though it were the very last act of your life.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Life is what happens when you’re busy making other plans.
author: John Lennon
